content: handy spider webs by irina holeyfiber these are fun and easy halloween mitts that you can crochet in no time please treat this not as a strict pattern but as an initial idea that is very easy to modify to fit any color size or taste used yarn a little bit of aunt lydia s classic crochet size 10 hook 1 75 mm gauge is not very important just change the number of stitches in the bracelet to fit your wrist and adjust the number of rounds in the web bracelet row 1 55 chain and then 1 double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hoock and each chain to the end row 2 starting and ending with 4-5dc 1 double_crochet 1 chain skipping 1 double_crochet to the end row 3 4 starting and ending with 4-5dc 1 chain 1 double_crochet in each 1-chain space to the end row 5 1dc in each double_crochet and chain then make several row of single_crochet across narrow sides of the bracelet to sew the small snaps spider web the first double_crochet in each round = 3 chain round 1 start with 1dc + 1 chain 8 times in the ring round 2 1dc + 3 chain 8 times round 3 1 double_crochet + 5 chain 8 times round 4 1 half_double_crochet + 7 chain 8 times round 5 1 treble_crochet + 10 chain 8 times round 6 constantly trying it on complete this round connecting the spider web to the bracelet and making the loops around the thumb pointing finger and the pinkie or whatever you choose updated october 6 2008
